p: Histological screening of testes was carried out as described by Wolfang [ 22] for organ or tissues. Briefly, the right testis was fixed by immersion in Bouin solution for 1 week and then washed, dehydrated in ascending grade alcohol bath, clarified in xylene immersion, and embedded in paraffin. Sections of 5 μm were stained with hematoxylin-eosin for histological observations under a light microscope (400x).
